tasks.title: Update Q1 roadmap
tasks.description: Update the Q1 roadmap to reflect onboarding as top priority and push the advanced analytics pilot to March.
tasks.evidence: Mira, please update the roadmap to reflect that, and push analytics pilot to March?

tasks.title: Define 3 onboarding success KPIs
tasks.description: Define 3 concrete Key Performance Indicators to measure onboarding success within 30 days.
tasks.evidence: Mira, I want 3 concrete KPIs to measure onboarding success within 30 days. Can you do that by tomorrow morning?

tasks.title: Plan lightweight usability test for new onboarding
tasks.description: Plan a quick, lightweight usability test (max two sessions) for the new onboarding prototype once it's ready.
tasks.deadline: After new onboarding prototype is ready
tasks.evidence: Leah: Should we plan a quick usability test after the new onboarding prototype is ready? Nothing big, like two sessions max? Jeffy: Sounds good. Keep it lightweight.

tasks.title: Ensure consistent messaging for silent onboarding launch
tasks.description: Ensure internal and external messaging is consistent with the decision for a silent onboarding update (no ads or blog posts).
tasks.evidence: Leah: I'll keep messaging consistent.

tasks.title: Deliver design assets to engineering
tasks.description: Deliver the necessary design assets to Arun for engineering work.
tasks.evidence: Leah: You'll have them by 8 PM.

tasks.title: Plan A/B test for deferred permissions
tasks.description: Plan and implement an A/B test to evaluate deferring some permissions on the second onboarding step post-launch.
tasks.evidence: Yes, put that in as an A/B test post-launch.

tasks.title: Design and add explanatory microcopy/tooltips
tasks.description: Design and add short explanatory tooltips for the permission screen to reduce user confusion.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Sounds good, Daniel. Can you work on that? Daniel: Will do.

tasks.title: Record usability test sessions
tasks.description: Ensure all usability test sessions are recorded for detailed analysis.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Excellent. Make sure to record sessions for analysis.

tasks.title: Draft internal messaging regarding analytics pilot delay
tasks.description: Draft messaging to internal teams (e.g., marketing) to manage expectations about the analytics pilot being pushed to March.
tasks.evidence: Leah, please help draft messaging to internal teams.

tasks.title: Fix data pipeline bugs for analytics
tasks.description: Use the extra time from the analytics pilot delay to identify and fix data pipeline bugs to improve data accuracy.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Absolutely. Use the extra time to fix data pipeline bugs.

tasks.title: Prepare roadmap update deck
tasks.description: Prepare a concise deck outlining the key changes and dates in the updated Q1 roadmap.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Deck with key changes and dates. Keep it tight.

tasks.title: Prepare for Q&A at Thursday onboarding demo
tasks.description: Prepare to field questions from the team during the internal onboarding demo on Thursday.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Yes, Mira, you should be prepped.

tasks.title: Prepare user feedback snippets for onboarding demo
tasks.description: Prepare quick user feedback snippets to present during the internal onboarding demo.
tasks.evidence: Leah: I can prepare quick user feedback snippets for the demo.

tasks.title: Invite customer success to onboarding demo
tasks.description: Invite the customer success team to the internal onboarding demo on Thursday.
tasks.evidence: Leah: Should we invite customer success team? Jeffy: Yeah, good idea.

tasks.title: Conduct smoke tests for onboarding
tasks.description: QA team to conduct smoke tests for the onboarding flow.
tasks.evidence: Arun: QA is prepping test cases for onboarding. Will do smoke tests by Wednesday.

tasks.title: Finish final design icons
tasks.description: Finish the remaining final design icons for onboarding, which are currently a blocker.
tasks.evidence: Daniel: Yep, finishing final icons today.

tasks.title: Review final design icons
tasks.description: Review the final design icons completed by Daniel.
tasks.evidence: Leah: I'll review those tomorrow morning.

tasks.title: Add qualitative feedback to post-onboarding survey
tasks.description: Add a qualitative feedback question, such as an 'ease of use' rating, to the post-onboarding survey.
tasks.evidence: Leah: We'll add that to post-onboarding survey.

tasks.title: Expedite hiring of design intern
tasks.description: Expedite the process for hiring a design intern to address the current design resource crunch, as HR has candidates lined up.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Cool, please speed that up.

tasks.title: Build onboarding as modular pieces
tasks.description: Ensure the onboarding flow is built using modular components to facilitate future iterations and avoid rewrites.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Worth it. Build modular to avoid rewrites later.

tasks.title: Design clearer error messages
tasks.description: Design clearer and more helpful error messages for the onboarding flow based on user feedback.
tasks.evidence: Daniel: Will work on error message designs next week.

tasks.title: Send weekly onboarding progress updates to Marketing
tasks.description: Send weekly email updates to the marketing team regarding the onboarding progress.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Weekly email updates to them.

tasks.title: Coordinate legal compliance check for analytics data retention
tasks.description: Coordinate with the legal team for a compliance check on the analytics data retention policy.
tasks.evidence: Mira: I’ll coordinate.

tasks.title: Update onboarding help pages
tasks.description: Update the relevant help pages for the new onboarding experience.
tasks.evidence: Leah: Yes, updating onboarding help pages this week.

analysis_results.meeting_summary: The meeting established the onboarding revamp as the top priority for Q1, pushing the advanced analytics pilot to March. Key outcomes included defining onboarding KPIs, planning usability tests, and preparing for a Thursday internal demo, with a focus on modular development and a silent launch.
decisions: Onboarding revamp is the top priority for Q1.
The advanced analytics pilot will be pushed to March.
The onboarding launch will be a silent update, with no marketing ads or blog posts.
Core onboarding steps are prioritized over extra features.
A lightweight usability test for the new onboarding prototype will be conducted.
An internal onboarding demo will be held on Thursday, showing the core flow with integrated backend and mostly done UI.
The onboarding flow should be built using modular pieces to avoid future rewrites.
Multi-language support for onboarding is not planned for the initial Q1 launch.
